original_text:
“Foreigners will rebuild your walls,
    and their kings will serve you.
Though in anger I struck you,
    in favor I will show you compassion.
korean_text: 내가 노하여 너를 쳤으나 이제는 나의 은혜로 너를 불쌍히 여겼은즉 이방인들이 네 성벽을 쌓을 것이요 그들의 왕들이 너를 섬길 것이며

sentences.original_text: and their kings will serve you
Though in anger I struck you
in favor I will show you compassion
